Restricted fire season announced for parts of Hawke’s Bay https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/restricted-fire-season-announced-for-parts-of-hawkes-bay/FCTWO2VJPRGH5MGHKGLZR3YGVE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/restricted-fire-season-announced-for-parts-of-hawkes-bay/FCTWO2VJPRGH5MGHKGLZR3YGVE/ Restrictions have been placed on all outdoor fires in parts of Hawke's Bay. Fri, 08 Nov 2024 02:40:24 +0000 Outdoor fires including bonfires are banned during a restricted season.

Fri, 08 Nov 2024 02:37:43 +0000 Police say there are serious injuries after a crash in New Lynn, West Auckland.

Fri, 08 Nov 2024 02:15:55 +0000 Church Road, one of Hawke’s Bay’s oldest wineries, won big at the 2024 Hawke's Bay wine awards.
Gulf Harbour homicide: Trio charged with manslaughter and kidnapping appear in court in body-in-bag case https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gulf-harbour-homicide-trio-charged-with-manslaughter-and-kidnapping-appear-in-court-in-body-in-bag-case/WUAI4AFVRBHFDG6LYTVEILYAUA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gulf-harbour-homicide-trio-charged-with-manslaughter-and-kidnapping-appear-in-court-in-body-in-bag-case/WUAI4AFVRBHFDG6LYTVEILYAUA/ George BlockThe charges come eight months after they are accused of kidnapping Shulai Wang.
